survey_name: Employee Satisfaction with AI-Powered Workplace Scheduling Tools Survey
survey_brief: This survey aims to evaluate employee satisfaction and user experience with AI-powered workplace scheduling tools to help organizations optimize their digital workplace solutions.

questions.question_text: How frequently do you use AI-powered scheduling tools in your workplace?
questions.client_notes: Use a radio button for single-choice selection. Ensure the options cover a broad range of usage frequencies.

script.question_text: How frequently do you use AI-powered scheduling tools in your workplace?

questions.question_text: Which features of AI-powered scheduling tools do you find most useful? (Select all that apply)
questions.client_notes: Use checkboxes for multi-choice selection. Include an 'Other' option if needed for additional features.

script.question_text: Which features of AI-powered scheduling tools do you find most useful? (Select all that apply)

questions.question_text: How satisfied are you with the accuracy of AI-powered scheduling suggestions?
questions.routing_logic: All respondents who selected 'Daily' or 'Several times a week' in Q1
questions.client_notes: Use a Likert scale for satisfaction levels. Ensure the question is only shown to frequent users.

script.question_text: How satisfied are you with the accuracy of AI-powered scheduling suggestions?
script.routing_logic: All respondents who selected 'Daily' or 'Several times a week' in Q1

questions.question_text: What challenges have you faced while using AI-powered scheduling tools?
questions.client_notes: Open-ended question to capture qualitative feedback. Ensure the text box is mobile-friendly.

script.question_text: What challenges have you faced while using AI-powered scheduling tools?

questions.question_text: Would you recommend your organization's AI-powered scheduling tool to others?
questions.client_notes: Use a radio button for single-choice selection. Include a neutral option for undecided respondents.
